text: Yuriy Yermakov (born 3 September 1970) is a Ukrainian gymnast. He competed in seven events at the 1996 Summer Olympics, winning a bronze medal in the men's artistic team all-around event. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Ukraine Category:Gymnasts at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic medalists in gymnastics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Ukraine Category:Sportspeople from Donetsk
title: Yuriy Yermakov
